author: karl
msg: Added do_garbage_collection method that will delete sessions that are older
than a preset time (24 hours by default).
New consider_garbage_collection method will invoke do_garbage_collection a
certain percentage of the times a session is activated, by default 1% of the
time.

author: karl
msg: Commit of session management package.

author: karl
msg: Put in a commented-out puts to stderr of the errorInfo, with a comment.
When debugging a configure::test problem, comment it in for the full traceback.
(Normally we don't want to dump all that stuff on the user.)

author: karl
msg: Added /usr/local/bin and /usr/local/sbin to the directories that Rivet
configuration looks in to find apxs, when the path to apxs wasn't specified
on the configure command line.
When building Apache from the ports tree on FreeBSD, apxs gets put in
/usr/local/sbin.  I added /usr/local/bin as well, following /usr/bin and
/usr/sbin, for consistency.

author: karl
msg: Changed findapxs::FindAPXS to generate an error if it couldn't find a
working apxs utility, rather than just returning an empty string.
Previously if apxs could not be found, the error message emitted by
configure.tcl was:
Error in CFLAGS test: couldn't execute "": no such file or directory
With this change, if apxs cannot be found, the error message is now:
Error in APXS test: could not find Apache Extension Tool apxs in
/usr/local/apache/bin
/usr/local/etc/apache/bin
/usr/bin/
/usr/sbin/
